post.title: back to the future ii and iii on maxhd 5/10/2008
post.content: set your hd dvr's and tivohd's gentleman... back to the future ii- sat, may 10 2008 2:40pm - 4:30pm, maxhd back to the future iii- sat, may 10 2008 4:30pm - 6:30pm, maxhd only showings for this run in hd so don't miss it buttheads!
